Web traffic patterns from a single exter.Action: Analyze Zeek http.log and conn.log for external sources exhibiting scraping behavior. Establish a baseline for normal user browsing (e.g., request rate, page views per session, URL path entropy). Use statistical methods to identify significant outliers.
